title: Mock Drill in Karnataka’s Hubli Shared as Terrorists Help by Cops
subtitle: Fact Check of Terrorists Caught in Hubli | A video of policemen surrounding a man in front of a bus at a bus stand is going viral with the claim that it shows terrorists in Hubli, Karnataka. But it is a mock drill.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video of policemen surrounding a man in front of a bus at a bus stand is being shared with the claim that it shows terrorists in Hubli, Karnataka.

However, we found that this is actually a mock drill carried out by police to capture suspected terrorists and does not actually show them capturing actual terrorists.
